museums.title: Boijmans Van Beuningen
museums.description: Museum for fine arts with an extensive collection of paintings and sculptures.

museums.title: Kunsthal Rotterdam
museums.description: Contemporary art museum showcasing a diverse range of exhibitions and installations.

museums.title: Maritime Museum
museums.description: Explore the maritime history of Rotterdam through exhibits and interactive displays.

museums.title: Nederlands Fotomuseum
museums.description: Dedicated to photography, featuring a collection of Dutch and international photographic works.

museums.title: Chabot Museum
museums.description: Museum housed in a modernist villa displaying works of the Dutch sculptor and painter Henk Chabot.

museums.title: Natural History Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: Discover the natural world with exhibits on geology, paleontology, and biology.

museums.title: Wereldmuseum
museums.description: Museum featuring artifacts from cultures around the world, with a focus on ethnography and anthropology.

museums.title: Havenmuseum
museums.description: Open-air maritime museum showcasing historic ships and harbor-related exhibits.

museums.title: Witte de With Center for Contemporary Art
museums.description: Contemporary art center hosting exhibitions, events, and artist residencies.

museums.title: Historisch Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: Museum focusing on the history of Rotterdam with exhibits on its development and cultural heritage.

museums.title: Natuurhistorisch Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: Natural history museum featuring exhibits on flora, fauna, and the geological history of the region.

museums.title: Cube Houses Museum
museums.description: Experience life inside the iconic Cube Houses with a museum showcasing their architecture and history.

museums.title: Het Nieuwe Instituut
museums.description: Institute for architecture, design, and digital culture with exhibitions and research programs.

museums.title: Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: City history museum covering the development of Rotterdam from medieval times to the present.

museums.title: De Kunsthal
museums.description: Rotterdam's versatile art space featuring a mix of visual arts, design, and contemporary culture.
